author: psmith
msg: All Preferences for a LogPanel (those that are encapsulate in
the LogPanelPreferenceModel class at any rate) are now remembered
Currently this relies on the object being serialized, and
the column widths are stored in a separate file at the moment.
Soon to be combined into a single permanent storage item/file.
Each LogPanel is now registered with the SettingsManager and
is notified when to save it's settings.

author: psmith
msg: small refactor so that an in VM class could start Chainsaw.

author: psmith
msg: added the ability to load remote URLs into Chainsaw

author: sdeboy
msg: * added an 'exists' operator to the set of rules and added support for the operator in ExpressionRule
* removed default preview panel from color panel
* Modified infix to postfix converter to throw an illegalargumentexception if the stack was empty
